mapper.select: SELECT FAQ_NO AS faqNo, FAQ_TITLE AS faqTitle, FAQ_CONTENT AS faqContent, TO_CHAR(FAQ_CREATED, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시"MI"분"') AS faqCreated, FAQ_HIT AS faqHit FROM TBL_FAQ WHERE FAQ_NO = #{param1}
mapper.update: update TBL_FAQ set FAQ_TITLE=#{faqTitle}, FAQ_CONTENT=#{faqContent} where FAQ_NO=#{faqNo}
